===============================================
 oslo.db -- OpenStack Database Pattern Library
===============================================

The oslo.db (database) handling library, provides database
connectivity to different database backends and various other helper
utils.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   install/index
   contributor/index
   user/index
   reference/index

Release Notes
=============

Read also the `oslo.db Release Notes
<https://docs.openstack.org/releasenotes/oslo.db/>`_.
